item.title: C in the Unix Environment
item.description: Over the years I have been involved in a few major projects (“I’ve seen things you people wouldn’t believe….”) that are worth preserving here. C Programming in a Unix Environment The first was a textbook that Judy Kay and I wrote in the 1980’s on the C programming language. As well as describing and teaching the language as it was at the time in a fairly complete manner, we also wanted to show how it fitted into the Unix programming environment.
